Package com.movlad.semviz.application

Class CloudGeometryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movlad.semviz.application.CloudGeometryBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HighResolutionCloudBuilder, NormalColoredCloudBuilder, QHullBuilder
    public abstract class CloudGeometryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for cloud data extractor (base rgb, normal rgb, qhull ).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      abstract void buildDataBuffer()
      Generates the GL vertex buffer.
      void buildDataBufferLayout()
      Builds the layout of the vertex buffer, which is composed of a position and a color.
      abstract void buildGeometry()
      Generates the geometry from the data buffer and the layout; defines the geometry's GL drawing mode (e.g. GL_LINES, GL_POINTS, GL_TRIANGLES).
      Geometry getGeometry()
